results.title: Corneal Endothelial Dysfunction as a Manifestation of Digoxin Toxicity.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: A 77-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ diagnosed with @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma_Open_Angle</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005902 @@@open-angle glaucoma@@@ and treated with a topical @CHEMICAL_Prostaglandins @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011453 @@@prostaglandin@@@ analog for 5 years developed @DISEASE_Vision_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D014786 @@@blurred vision@@@ and @DISEASE_photopsia @DISEASE_MESH:C000726607 @@@photopsia@@@ in both eyes.

citations.NLM: Mendoza-Moreira AL, Rodrigo-Rey S, Figuerola-García MB, González-Alonso Á, Marcos-Parra MT, Pérez-Santonja JJ. Corneal Endothelial Dysfunction as a Manifestation of Digoxin Toxicity. Cornea. 2022 Sep 1;41(9):1174-1176. PMID: 35120352
